title: Quote Auto Insurance with a Poor Driving Record
description: A potential customer with multiple accidents and tickets is requesting an auto insurance quote.

tasks.description: Gather the applicant's information and run their MVR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the driving record, which shows 2 at-fault accidents and 3 speeding tickets in the last 3 years.

tasks.description: Determine if the applicant is eligible for a standard policy or if they need to be referred to a high-risk (non-standard) carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent determines the applicant's record makes them ineligible for a standard policy.

tasks.description: Inform the applicant of the decision and provide them with information for the state's high-risk insurance pool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the situation and provides helpful alternative information.
